title: Ira Parker Teases a Big Event from ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Season 2
full_text: Ira Parker Teases a Big Event from ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Season 2. If you've read George R.R. Martin's 'The Sworn Sword,' you know the challenges that await production as the HBO series continues.. If you’ve been watching A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms, you probably haven’t taken much note of the weather in and around Ashford Meadow. Sure, there’s a bit of rain and mist and mud, but it’s genera… [+2376 chars]
